Each time you use this item, roll a d10. On a one, the item is broken, and you take the damage rather than your targets. (DC 35 craft and engineering checks to repair afterwards)
Each time you use this item, roll a d20. On a one, the item is destroyed, and you take the damage rather than your targets.
